name: SQS
description: Simple queue service for message queuing

name.label: Queue Name
name.description: The name of the SQS queue

visibility_timeout_seconds.label: Visibility Timeout (seconds)
visibility_timeout_seconds.description: The visibility timeout for the queue

message_retention_seconds.label: Message Retention (seconds)
message_retention_seconds.description: The number of seconds to retain messages

max_message_size.label: Max Message Size (bytes)
max_message_size.description: The maximum message size in bytes

delay_seconds.label: Delay Seconds
delay_seconds.description: The time in seconds to delay message delivery

receive_wait_time_seconds.label: Receive Wait Time (seconds)
receive_wait_time_seconds.description: The time to wait for messages (0 for short polling, >0 for long polling)

content_based_deduplication.label: Content-Based Deduplication
content_based_deduplication.description: Enable content-based deduplication for FIFO queues

dead_letter_queue.label: Dead Letter Queue ARN
dead_letter_queue.description: ARN of the dead letter queue (optional)

tags.label: Tags
tags.description: JSON string of tags to apply
